title: Computer failure every couple hours or so
body: Laptop is only a month old. Every now and then the audio in game will suddenly stop working. Then over the next 5 minutes my fps drops terribly until the game is unplayable and it freezes. I've done the obvious stuff like update drivers/windows, etc. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be an issue with some of your other system drivers or hardware. Be sure you update the drivers for all your computer from the manufacturer's support site. Next, I'd recommend working through the steps in our [Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), which may help resolve this by addressing some other potential issues.

Let me know if this helped.
